item.title: Video Content Creator for Local Jewelry Company (Salt Lake City / Park City) - Upwork
item.description:
Description:
We're a jewelry company based in Park City seeking a skilled video content creator to produce video content to be used in ads and organic social media.

Responsibilities:

Develop and produce engaging video content, from concept to final edit.
Collaborate with our marketing team on video concepts and scripts.
Shoot and edit videos.
Ensure timely delivery of high-quality videos that meet our brand standards.

Requirements:

Proven experience in video production.
Proficiency in video editing tools.
Strong portfolio demonstrating previous video work.
Must be based locally in Salt Lake City / Park City for on-site shooting.

Duration: Freelance, potential for ongoing collaboration based on performance.


Posted On: June 21, 2024 20:04 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Production, TikTok, Video Editing, Video Ad
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Production, TikTok, Video Editing, Video Ad
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: HP Product Unboxing/Demo Video - New York, NY - Upwork
item.description:
Read in Full with product page linked below
HP OmniBook Unboxing and Demo Video
Final Deliverable: 4K 3min video (+/-) to highlight key features and experiences of the PC
Equipment Required: (2) 4K Cameras, Tri-pods for locked footage, gimbal/stabilizer, lavalier mic, LED Lighting kit
Environment: Office environment, Outdoor location tbd (for mobility story)
- Potential existing footage to be included
Post production: add in-screen demo videos and VO to show experiences
Product Page - https://www.hp.com/us-en/laptops-and-2-in-1s/omnibook-x-ai-pc.html

"HP OmniBook X AI PCs are designed to focus on the big things and let the small things take care of themselves. Power your personal productivity with AI that learns from you and adapts to you. Now you can have the perfect mix of powerful performance and mobility to seamlessly adapt to your work style, and the best collaboration tools designed to enhance personal connections and communicate more effectively with others. Unlock more meaningful moments with HP’s AI-powered PCs"


Posted On: June 21, 2024 19:47 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:How To, Documentary, Demo Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Lighting
Skills: How To, Documentary, Demo Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Lighting

item.title: Long-Term Video Editor Needed for Livestream to YouTube Highlight Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

I am seeking a long-term video editor to transform my live streams into engaging 5-8 minute highlight videos for YouTube.

Project Details:

Source Video: https://youtube.com/live/ld-6GDL6I2g?feature=share
Task: Create a 5-8 minute highlight video
Purpose: To evaluate the quality and style of your work for potential long-term collaboration.

Requirements:

Experience in editing live streams into engaging, high-quality highlight videos.
Ability to capture viewer interest without overusing memes, sound effects, or music.

Editing Style Preferences:

Example 1: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/I7eSEWGa440
Example 2: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/WIBALFEa1Ak
Example 3: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/LMs2aJrbFs8

Example of Previous Work:

This is a video we received in the past. It is good but has too many memes, loud sound effects, and distracting music.
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Q8Pl9U90nKBW01fW_e7BWFiDkkr3AcZa?usp=sharing


Next Steps:

Please provide your rate for creating one highlight video based on the specifications above. This will help me determine if we can proceed with a long-term partnership. Workload would be 1 video a week.

Looking forward to your proposals!

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 21, 2024 19:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: LA based videographer this weekend music video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, I am shooting a music video, we have already shot about half of the footage on the beach. The vibe is dreamy, sensual, aesthetic RnB. Looking for someone available on Sunday afternoon/evening to shoot. Will take probably a couple of hours.
You MUST understand aesthetics and beauty, and how to capture that. This isn't just show up and shoot. I am not sure what the venue will be, so please offer suggestions to match the moody/beachy scene we have already.
If you are not available on Sunday, let me know when you are.
You can look at my instagram to see previews of the other scene and my aesthetic.

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6aOS9wrhO4/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

This is the song! Thanks!

https://open.spotify.com/track/4vjvliya78afCD9N0jlIyl?si=51c147fcd6d94696

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 21, 2024 19:30 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production
Skills: Videography, Video Production
Country: United States

item.title: YouTube Travel Vlog Channel Setup and Optimization Expert - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an experienced YouTube expert to help me set up and optimize a YouTube travel vlog channel. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record in YouTube channel creation, optimization, and growth strategies. The goal is to maximize income potential through effective settings, SEO, and monetization strategies.

Responsibilities

Channel Setup:
- Create and configure the YouTube channel with all necessary settings.
- Advise on the best country and language settings for maximum reach and income.
- Design and set up an engaging channel banner and logo.
- Develop a compelling channel description and about section.

SEO and Content Strategy:
- Conduct keyword research to identify high-traffic keywords for travel vlogs.
- Optimize video titles, descriptions, and tags for SEO.
- Create a content calendar with video ideas that appeal to a global audience.

Monetization and Income Maximization:
- Set up AdSense and other monetization methods.
- Provide strategies for increasing subscriber count and watch time.
- Advise on the best practices for affiliate marketing and brand collaborations.

Audience Engagement:
- Develop strategies to engage with viewers and build a loyal community.
- Provide guidance on effective use of social media to promote the channel.
- Advise on best practices for responding to comments and fostering engagement.

Brand Affiliations and Sponsorships:
- Identify potential brands for collaborations and sponsorships.
- Create a media kit and pitch template for approaching brands.
- Advise on pricing and negotiation strategies for sponsorship deals.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in YouTube channel creation and optimization.
- Demonstrated success in growing YouTube channels, particularly in the travel niche.
- Strong understanding of YouTube SEO and keyword research.
- Experience with monetization strategies including AdSense, affiliate marketing, and brand collaborations.
- Excellent communication skills and ability to provide clear, actionable advice.
- Portfolio or case studies of previous successful YouTube projects.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with travel vlogs or similar content.
- Knowledge of global travel trends and audience preferences.
- Ability to design engaging channel graphics and video thumbnails.

Application Requirements:
- A brief cover letter explaining your experience and how you can help maximize the success of my YouTube travel vlog channel.
-Examples of previous YouTube channels you have worked on, particularly in the travel niche.
Any additional ideas or strategies you have for setting up and growing a successful YouTube travel vlog channel.

About Me:
I am a freelance web designer and aspiring Punjabi hip-hop artist based in Dubai. I have a strong focus on success and struggle, having achieved success from humble beginnings. I am passionate about travel and storytelling, and I am looking to share my journey with a global audience through my YouTube travel vlog channel.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 19:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Video Editing
Country: Pakistan
click to apply
